Structs.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advisor12Any.name: AnyModerator
Structs.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advisor12Any.abstract: This wrapper struct allows for rapidly checking limits for passed arguments to extended isUnderLimit:suggestions:

Structs/TipCategoryFactory.html.abstract: This struct conforming to CategoryFactory produces a specified TipCategory.

Structs/Flag.html.name: Flag
Structs/Flag.html.abstract: This concrete sub class of Flag abstraction creates instances of Flag’s that can be saved as records in the database.

Protocols/FlagAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.name: reason
Protocols/FlagAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This property stores the criteria for which a USER has flagged tip.

Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.name: editorEmail
Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.abstract: This optionl property stores an email address, if supplied by the USER, to contact them about the results of their suggested moderation.

Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.name: tip
Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.abstract: This property stores a database reference to the Tip suggested moderation concerns.

Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.name: creator
Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.abstract: This optional property stores database identifier for the USER suggesting moderation.

Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.name: state
Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.abstract: This property stores a moderation state used to track it’s approval progress.

Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.name: limit
Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html#/s:17.abstract: This static, read-only & optional property returns the maximum amount of active moderation records in the database (by type) the USER is limited to.

Protocols/ModerationSuggester.html#/s:17.name: type
Protocols/ModerationSuggester.html#/s:17.abstract: This type association references the suggested moderation that suggester will suggest.

Protocols/ModerationSuggester.html#/s:17.name: isUnderLimit(for:)
Protocols/ModerationSuggester.html#/s:17.abstract: This method reviews the suggestions passed, and returns true when the number of suggestions created by USER in set are less than the suggestion’s limit.

Protocols/EditAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.name: newText
Protocols/EditAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This optional property can store changes to tip body text which USER is modifying.

Protocols/EditAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.name: newCategory
Protocols/EditAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This optional property can store changes to tip category which USER is modifying.

Protocols/NewTipAbstraction.html#/s:17Sm.name: text
Protocols/NewTipAbstraction.html#/s:17Sm.abstract: This property stores the textual representation of advice that would be embodied in the potential tip.

Protocols/NewTipAbstraction.html#/s:17Sm.name: category
Protocols/NewTipAbstraction.html#/s:17Sm.abstract: This property stores a string representation of the categorical type that encompasses the potential tip.

Protocols/VoteAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.name: isFor
Protocols/VoteAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This property stores the direction vote was cast: for (true) or against (false).

Protocols/VoteAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.name: candidate
Protocols/VoteAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This property stores the tip that vote was cast for.

Protocols/VoteAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.name: constituent
Protocols/VoteAbstraction.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This property stores the voter that cast the ballot.

Protocols/PickerDecorator.html#/s:17Smal.name: decorate(_:for:)
Protocols/PickerDecorator.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This method decorates passed picker for passed view controller including frame, color, borders and delegation.

Protocols/PickerDecorator.html#/s:17Smal.name: centeredBox(inside:)
Protocols/PickerDecorator.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This method returns CGRect for framing pickerView in the center of passed view.

Protocols/VoteCounter.html#/s:17Small_Bi.name: allVotes
Protocols/VoteCounter.html#/s:17Small_Bi.abstract: This read-only property contains an up-to-date collection of all the votes currently in the database.

Protocols/VoteCounter.html#/s:17Small_Bi.name: rank(for:by:)
Protocols/VoteCounter.html#/s:17Small_Bi.abstract: This method orders an array of tips based on their popularity, and possibility to limit results based on category. More votes equals an earlier position in the returned array (e.g. index of 0 is the most popular position).

Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.name: suggestion
Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.abstract: This property stores SuggestedModeration whose data will be displayed in view. When set, will update reasonLabel and indicatorImage

Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.name: associatedTip
Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.abstract: This optional property stores any Tip associated with the suggestion property. When set, will update tipTextLabel

Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.name: indicatorImage
Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.abstract: This IBOutlet property references cell’s image indicating suggestion type. BG Color is changed to match state with the change:state method.

Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.name: change(state:)
Protocols/SuggestionCell.html#/s:17Small.abstract: This internal, void method adjusts the BG Color of indicatorImage based on state.

Protocols/TipEditor.html#/s:17Small_Biz_.name: tip
Protocols/TipEditor.html#/s:17Small_Biz_.abstract: This optional property will be set when local view controller is destination for AdvisorViewController.

Protocols/Pickable.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.name: title
Protocols/Pickable.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.abstract: This read-only property returns a title string for display in UIPickerView cell.

Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.name: limitation
Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.abstract: This optional property should trigger a category limitation when not nil. When not nil, all methods and computed properties return results limited to the subset of tips that matches the category specified.

Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.name: lastRank
Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.abstract: This property saves the rank of the last tip factory produced and returned.

Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.name: count
Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.abstract: This read only property returns the total number of entries.

Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.name: rank(of:)
Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.abstract: This method decorates and returns an Entry specified by rank.

Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.name: random()
Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html#/s:.abstract: This method decorates and returns a random Entry.

Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.name: text
Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.abstract: This property stores the actual string of text composing each entry, with formatting.

Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.name: category
Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.abstract: This property stores the category the entry’s text is associated with.

Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.name: asEquatable()
Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.abstract: This method is used to wrap conforming instance in an Equatable version used when comparing.

Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.name: isEqualTo(entry:)
Protocols/Entry.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Advi.abstract: This method is used when making comparisons, allowing for a uniform implementation of == requirement in

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: updateButton
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This read-only property returns the button that will change bg &/or fg colors when enabled / disabled.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: activeColor
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This read-only property returns the color updateButton will display to indicate enabled.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: inactiveColor
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This read-only property returns the color updateButton will display to indicate disabled.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: enableChanges(fgChange:bgChange:)
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This method should enable updateButton and adjust colors as specified in parameters.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: disableChanges(fgChange:bgChange:)
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This method should disable updateButton and adjust colors as specified in parameters.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: enableChangesWhileIgnoringFgColor()
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This method will enable changes while ignoring updateButton’s title text color.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: disableChangesWhileIgnoringFgColor()
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This method will disable changes while ignoring updateButton’s title text color.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: enableChangesWhileIgnoringBgColor()
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This method will enable changes while ignoring updateButton’s background color.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.name: disableChangesWhileIgnoringBgColor()
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html#/s:17Small_.abstract: This method will disable changes while ignoring updateButton’s background color.

Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html.name: ButtonEnabler
Protocols/ButtonEnabler.html.abstract: This protocol supports view controllers with UIButtons that need to change bg &/or fg colors when enabled / disabled.

Protocols/Entry.html.name: Entry
Protocols/Entry.html.abstract: This protocol defines the core unit of the data model as a list entry that has a category, text and index.

Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html.name: TipFactoryAbstraction
Protocols/TipFactoryAbstraction.html.abstract: This protocol ensures that the factory produces entries by both random and specified index.

Protocols/Pickable.html.name: Pickable
Protocols/Pickable.html.abstract: This protocol supports conforming instances being listed in a UIPickerView.

Protocols/TipEditor.html.name: TipEditor
Protocols/TipEditor.html.abstract: This protocol should be conformed by any view controller that wants to recieve the current tip during a segue from AdvisorViewController (or any other controller passing a tip to be edited / reviewed).

Protocols/SuggestionCell.html.name: SuggestionCell
Protocols/SuggestionCell.html.abstract: This protocol is conformed to by UITableViewCells presenting SuggestedModeration types.

Protocols/VoteCounter.html.name: VoteCounter
Protocols/VoteCounter.html.abstract: This protocol can be adopted by types that need to tabulate votes and rank tips based on their popularity.

Protocols/PickerDecorator.html.name: PickerDecorator
Protocols/PickerDecorator.html.abstract: This protocol ensures conforming types can decorate a picker and provide it’s delegate and dataSource.

Protocols/NewTipAbstraction.html.name: NewTipAbstraction
Protocols/NewTipAbstraction.html.abstract: This abstraction of NewTip functionality ensures this form of moderation contains properties that match necessary dependencies for potential Tip to be created.

Protocols/EditAbstraction.html.name: EditAbstraction
Protocols/EditAbstraction.html.abstract: This abstraction of Edit functionality ensures this form of moderation contains properties that match Tip properties that can be modified.

Protocols/ModerationSuggester.html.name: ModerationSuggester
Protocols/ModerationSuggester.html.abstract: This protocol is conformed by view controllers that will save moderation records to database.

Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html.name: SuggestedModeration
Protocols/SuggestedModeration.html.abstract: This abstract parent class for USER list moderation (e.g. flag, edit, new, etc…).

Protocols/CategoryFactory.html.name: CategoryFactory
Protocols/CategoryFactory.html.abstract: This protocol ensures conforming instances can produce a specified TipCategory.

Protocols/FlagAbstraction.html.name: FlagAbstraction
Protocols/FlagAbstraction.html.abstract: This abstracts the concept of flagging content for removal based on a specific criterion.

Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.name: submitted
Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.abstract: This state represents a SuggestedModeration submmitted by the USER, but not yet recognized by the system.

Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.name: opened
Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.abstract: This state represents a SuggestedModeration recognized by the system, but not yet resolved.

Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.name: closedApproved
Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.abstract: This state represents a SuggestedModeration resolved by the system as approved.

Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.name: closedRejected
Enums/ModerationState.html#/s:17Small_Bi.abstract: This state represents a SuggestedModeration resolved by the system as rejected.

Enums/FlagReason.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Adv.name: cloudValues
Enums/FlagReason.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Adv.abstract: This read-only, computed property returns a tuple of cloud values representing a primary reason (tuple index 0) and where necessary an auxiliary reason (tuple index 1).

Enums/FlagReason.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Adv.name: count
Enums/FlagReason.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Adv.abstract: This static constant returns the number of possible reasons enumerated by the FlagReason type.

Enums/FlagReason.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Adv.name: toStr()
Enums/FlagReason.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Adv.abstract: This method returns enumeration as a string.

Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: max
Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This static constant property returns the total number of categories.

Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: indexRange
Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This computed property returns the range of tip indices associated with each category.

Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: formatted
Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This computed property returns the title of each category as a string, with formatting.

Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: title
Enums/TipCategory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This read-only property returns a title string for display in UIPickerView cell.

Enums/TipCategory.html.name: TipCategory
Enums/TipCategory.html.abstract: This enumerates the different categories of tips that exist.

Enums/FlagReason.html.name: FlagReason
Enums/FlagReason.html.abstract: An enumeration of the criteria for which a USER has flagged tip.

Enums/ModerationState.html.name: ModerationState
Enums/ModerationState.html.abstract: This enumerates the moderation states used to track SuggestedModeration approval progress.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: tipBeingEdited
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: When this property is nil, VC is being used to create a new tip suggestion. Otherwise, the stored tip is being edited.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: selectedCategory
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This optional property stores new category selected, or nil if USER has not made a selection.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: editorTypeIndicator
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This IBOutlet property references a label that indicates type of editor: create new v. edit existing.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: categoryButton
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This IBOutlet property references the category button used to display current category and tap for more.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: textArea
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This IBOutlet property references the textArea used to communicate with USER.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: saveButton
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This IBOutlet property references the save button USER taps to save changes they’ve made.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: categories
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This property stores an MCReceiver associated w/TipCategory recordable.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: categoryTapped(_:)
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This IBAction method adds a category pickerView as subView when sender is tapped.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: saveTapped(_:)
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This IBAction method saves changes and unwindes back to AdvisorVC when sender is tapped.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController/Defau.name: Default
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController/Defau.abstract: This struct contains default strings for User Facing text in view controller.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.name: tip
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html#.abstract: This optional property will be set when local view controller is destination for AdvisorViewController.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.name: currentTip
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.abstract: This optional property stores the current tip being modified by voting and moderation buttons.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.name: previousVote
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.abstract: This optional property stores the last vote cast for currentTip. If no vote has been cast, is nil.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: upVoteButton
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This IBOutlet property stores a button that can be used to vote for currentTip, or undo.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: downVoteButton
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This IBOutlet property stores a button that can be used to vote against currentTip, or undo.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: addTipButton
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This IBOutlet property stores a button that can be used to present FieldsEditorVC to create a new tip.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: editTipButton
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This IBOutlet property stores a button that can be used to present FieldsEditorVC to edit currentTip.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: flagTipButton
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This IBOutlet property stores a button that can be used to present FlaggerVC to flag currentTip.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.name: votes
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.abstract: This property stores an MCReceiver associated w/Vote recordable.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.name: segue(from:)
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.abstract: This method will trigger segue from the parent view controller.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: upVoteTapped(_:)
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This IBAction method triggers an up vote situation in vote:up: method.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: downVoteTapped(_:)
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This IBAction method triggers a down vote situation in vote:up: method.

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: editTapped(_:)
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This method checks that AdvisorVC has a page value and that there’s no network error (defaultText).

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: addTapped(_:)
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This method checks that there’s no network error (defaultText).

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: flagTapped(_:)
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This method checks that AdvisorVC has a page value and that there’s no network error (defaultText).

Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.name: tip
Classes/EditorViewController.html#/s:17S.abstract: This optional property will be set when local view controller is destination for AdvisorViewController.

Classes/FlagTableViewCell.html#/s:17Smal.name: suggestion
Classes/FlagTableViewCell.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This property stores SuggestedModeration whose data will be displayed in view. When set, will update reasonLabel and indicatorImage

Classes/FlagTableViewCell.html#/s:17Smal.name: associatedTip
Classes/FlagTableViewCell.html#/s:17Smal.abstract: This optional property stores any Tip associated with the suggestion property. When set, will update tipTextLabel

Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.name: votes
Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.abstract: This constant property connects to the cloud and manages all vote records, conforming to MCRecievesRecordable. Access votes as array in votes.recordables. Also, contains vote counting / tip ranking methods.

Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.name: lastRank
Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.abstract: This property saves the rank of the last tip factory produced and returned.

Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.name: limitation
Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.abstract: This optional property triggers a category limitation when not nil. When not nil, all methods and computed properties return results limited to the subset of tips that matches the category specified.

Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.name: count
Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.abstract: This read-only, computed property returns the total number of tips in database (will limit count by category if limitation active).

Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.name: rank(of:)
Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.abstract: This method decorates and returns an Entry currently at the specified rank.

Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.name: init()
Classes/TipFactory.html#/s:17Small_Biz_A.abstract: This constructor allows initialization with no parameter (defaults to .publicDB).

Classes/TipFactory/VotingBooth.html.name: VotingBooth
Classes/TipFactory/VotingBooth.html.abstract: This inner class connects to the cloud and manages all vote records, conforming to MCReciever. Access votes as array in votes.recordables. Also, contains vote counting / tip ranking methods.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: tips
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This constant property stores the Tip mirror and accessors by rank / random for public database.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: votes
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This constant property stores the Vote mirror for public database.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: flags
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This constant property stores the Flag mirror for public database.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: edits
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This constant property stores the TipEdit mirror for public database.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: newTips
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This constant property stores the Vote mirror for public database.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: allSuggestions
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This read-only, computed property returns an array of all suggestions (flags + edits + news).

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: allSuggestionNotifications
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This read-only, computed property returns an array of change notifications matching all mirrors used in allSuggestions property.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: userHasSuggestions
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This read-only, computed property returns true if USER has associated suggestions, else false.

Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.name: decorateForModerationTVC()
Classes/CentralNC.html#/s:17Small_Biz_Ad.abstract: This internal, void method makes NavBar visible and decorates it for ModerationTableViewController presentation.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.name: tips
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: This property stores an MCReceiver associated w/Tip recordable.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.name: flags
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: This property stores an MCReceiver associated w/Flag recordable.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.name: reason
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: This optional property is set when a reason for flagging tip specified by USER. Otherwise, is nil.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.name: isFlagged
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: When USER has an active flag, returns true.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.name: sampleModel
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: This optional property is accessed by UIPickerViewDataSource to determine model info to load.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.name: tip
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: This optional property references the tip being flagged by the USER.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.name: flaggerLabel
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property references the main label used to communicate with USER.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.name: flaggerPicker
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property references the pickerView used to select FlagReason.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.name: flagButton
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property references the button used to save configured flag to database.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.name: flagPressed(_:)
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBAction method saves flag to database when USER taps sender.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.name: tips
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: This receiver is the primary connection to the data model. Handles vote counting locally.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.name: tipPassingAllowed
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: This boolean can be used to prevent AdvisorVC from passing tip to TipEditor in AdvisorVC.prepare:forSegue:

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.name: page
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: page stores index of the current entry from the data model, and when set pageLabel.text is refreshed.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.name: isRandom
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: isRandom is toggled between true (next entry determined at random) & false (entries come in order).

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: randomBar
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property serves as change type indicator. When visible, change order is random.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: rankedBar
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property serves as change type indicator. When visible, change order is according to rank.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: pageLabel
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: pageLabel shows the rank of the current entry from the data model.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: textView
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: textView shows the body text from the current entry from the data model.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: selectCategoryButton
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property displays current tip’s category and serves a button to limit list by category.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: categoryLock
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property displays category lock status and switchs category limitation state.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: suggestionsButton
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBOutlet property dipslays a link to the ModerationTableViewController if USER has any suggestions.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: canBecomeFirstResponder
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This override allows AdvisorViewController to become first responder (to user interactions); always true.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.name: increasePage()
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: increasePage should be run whenever the USER performs shake gesture or swipes to move forward (swiping backwards call decreasePage instead).

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.name: decreasePage()
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/s:17.abstract: decreasePage should run whenever the USER swipes backward and randomSwitch is off.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: unwindToHome(segue:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBAction method is used by other view controllers to unwind back to AdvisorViewController.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: logoTapped(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBAction method exits the app and opens browser (w/specified site) when user taps logo.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: randomPressed(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: rankedPressed(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: helpPressed(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: When helpPressed this method populates screen with help message and support links.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: swipeLeft(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Recognizes the USER performing swipe gesture on textView and takes action based on direction.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: swipeRight(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Recognizes the USER performing swipe gesture on textView and takes action based on direction.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: categoryLockTapped(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBAction method switches category limitation lock state when user taps category lock button.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: categorySelectorTapped(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: This IBAction method presents category pickerView selector when category limited and USER taps.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: The only configurations in this override are setting first responder and initializing instruction text.

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: motionEnded(_:with:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.name: prepare(for:sender:)
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvisorViewController.html.name: AdvisorViewController
Classes/AdvisorViewController.html.abstract: The AdvisorViewController is the primary view controller for the entire app. It handles all user interactions (swipes, shakes and taps) and displays the appropriate strings harvested from the data model: ResponseText.

Classes/FlaggerViewController.html.name: FlaggerViewController
Classes/FlaggerViewController.html.abstract: This sub-class inherits from UIViewController, and manages USER’s ability to flag tips for removal / correction.

Classes/TipFactory.html.name: TipFactory
Classes/TipFactory.html.abstract: This class produces entries (tips) recovered from the database, both by random and by rank. Also, maintains an up-to-date count of entries in database. Sub-class of MCReceiver.

Classes/ModerationTableViewController.ht.name: ModerationTableViewController
Classes/ModerationTableViewController.ht.abstract: This sub-class of UITableViewController has a single column and lists rows of cells representing the various SuggestedModerations created by current USER. Cells can be used to access data, contact support or cancel moderation.

Classes/FlagTableViewCell.html.name: FlagTableViewCell
Classes/FlagTableViewCell.html.abstract: This sub-class of UITableViewCell presents a GUI interpretation of data model’s Flag type.

Classes/EditorViewController.html.name: EditorViewController
Classes/EditorViewController.html.abstract: This view controller is a child of AdvisorViewController and contains voting and moderation buttons.

Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html.name: FieldsEditorViewController
Classes/FieldsEditorViewController.html.abstract: This view controller is presented by AdvisorVC when either USER requests to create a new tip (tipBeingEdited is nil) or edit an existing tip (tipBeingEdited != nil).
